means: 阿萨姆邦（印度东北部的邦）

sentence.Network_en: Fewer than 200 were left in the north Indian state of Assam a century ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个世纪以前,生活在印度阿萨姆邦(Assam)的犀牛还不足200头.

sentence.Network_en: Research will start next April at Tocklai in Assam state, Hazarika said.

sentence.Network_en: TV pictures showed women queuing in Assam in light drizzle.
sentence.Network_cn: 电视画面显示,在阿萨姆,妇女在天刚蒙蒙亮就已经去排队了.
